metadata.description: Base URL for Template Files
OpenShift Master Node VM size
OpenShift Infra Node VM size
OpenShift Compute Node VM size
OpenShift cluster prefix.  Used to generate master, infra and node hostnames.

OpenShift Master Load Balancer public IP DNS name (hostname portion). Must be lowercase. It should match with the following regular expression: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$ or it will raise an error.

OpenShift Public Infra Nodes Load Balancer public IP DNS name (hostname portion). Must be lowercase. It should match with the following regular expression: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$ or it will raise an error.

OpenShift Restricted Infra Nodes Load Balancer public IP DNS name (hostname portion). Must be lowercase. It should match with the following regular expression: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$ or it will raise an error.
Number of OpenShift Master Nodes.
Number of OpenShift Infra Nodes.
Number of OpenShift test environment Compute Nodes.
Number of OpenShift production environment Compute Nodes.
Size of Datadisk in GB for Docker volume
Administrator username on all VMs and first user created for OpenShift login
Password for OpenShift user to login to OpenShift Console
Azure AD Client ID
Azure AD Client Secret
Red Hat Organization ID
Red Hat Activation Key for Openshift Master/Infra/Broker entitlements
Red Hat Activation Key for OpenShift Compute Node entitlements
SSH public key for all VMs
Resource Group that contains the Key Vault
Name of the Key Vault
Key Vault Secret Name that contains the Private Key
Default Subdomain type - xip.io or custom (defined in next parameter)
Default Subdomain for application routing (Wildcard DNS) - must enter something even if you are using xip.io
